banner.rightSubTitle: We are looking for talents to join IDEACONCERT
banner.rightTitle: We can grow together, Challenge Now!

tech.subTitle: The Best of Content & Cultural Techonologies
tech.mainText:
IdeaConcert develops technologies for webtoons and comics
With our help, you can dream of a brighter future
Use the right technologies and make contents even more enjoyable
tech.autoToolText:
A technology that can converts black and white comic books into webtoons.
It is an authoring tool that automatically/manually separates image panels when you upload a scanned copy and turns it into a webtoon.
tech.separateText:
AI technology used to automatically extract panels from comics,
recognize texts, and add moving effects to scenes
tech.separateBox02: Set the order through panel analysis
tech.separateBox04:
Scenes produced through panels analysis,
Matching time and transtions
tech.translateText:
AI technology that extracts contents from speech bubbles,
translates texts, and rearrange them back in the speech bubbles
tech.viewerText:
Flip the smartphone to automatically convert the imagem format
4:4 vertical or 16:9 horizontal formats easily adapt images to the screen position
tech.viewerBox01:
Play webtoon movies
uploaded to web platforms
tech.viewerDesc: Automatically convert the video size by turning the smartphone
tech.damdaTitle: DAMDA, a photo edditing app for life's precious moments
tech.damdaText:
Enjoy the iconic photo booth collage templates in the most funny ways.
Decorate your favorite pictures with stickers and templates
tech.toonivieText:
Technology that allows anyone to easily turn webtoon images into videos
Advanced image separation and new functions are currently in preparation
tech.toonivieBtn: All features are being advanced with automation
tech.toonivieDesc: The usual 12 steps can be easily reduced to only 5 steps Upload webtoon> Separate images> Apply one-click directing effects> Edit sound and BGM> Complete

about.subTitle:
IDEACONCERT creates the New Contents & Cultural Technology
that makes people feel joyfulness.
about.mainText:
Through the cultural technology, a content that people can enjoy in the world is being created.
In order to make you enjoy comics and webtoons more, and having fun with the content that you never see before.
"Joyful Imagination" will continue to meet you through various interesting contents.
about.teamsDesc:
Various teams work and collaborate together in order to achieve our vision
to provide the various interesting contents to all people in the world.
about.teamBox01Text: Doing research for the Authoring Tool Technology & develop platform and App.
about.teamBox02Text: Doing video production from image contents such as webtoons, comics, fairy tales books, etc.
about.teamBox03Text: Responsible to design UX/UI and all related to the company brand.
about.teamBox04Text: Doing business planning, marketing dan sales activities with a clear business goal.
about.teamBox05Text: Firmly support the tasks necessary for the management of the company.

about.newsText: Everything about the news of IDEACONCERT.

business.subTitle: A Combination of authoring technology and creative content creates a new Business Opportunity.
business.mainText:
IDEACONCERT created Webtoon Movie Authoring Tool called "Toonivie".
Toonivie is an Authoring Tool that has the feature such as
image separation, screen directing, sound effect, dubbing and translation function.
In addition, the integration with a professional video production team makes us can produce videos optimally.
business.produceBox01Text: This is content that allows you to enjoy webtoons with lively screen animation and sound effect. IDEACONCERT has the ability to distribute webtoon movies that can be enjoyed more than a normal webtoon by everyone everywhere.
business.produceBox02Text: This is content that allows you to enjoy webtoons with lively screen animation and sound effect. IDEACONCERT has the ability to distribute webtoon movies that can be enjoyed more than a normal webtoon by everyone everywhere.
business.produceBox03Text: We edit the published comic book in the form of a webtoon to view the content with vertical scrolling. The new format gives you more opportunities to meet more readers.
business.produceBox04Text: This is content that allows you to enjoy comics with lively screen production and sound effect. IDEACONCERT has the ability to distribute comic movies that can be enjoyed more than a normal comic books by everyone everywhere.
business.researchBox01Text: The technology to separate uploaded images in a short time. You only need drag an area as "Square" or "free shape" then the image will automatically separated from the layer through AI recognition.
business.researchBox02Text: When you upload a digitized comic book image, the cuts on the page are automatically separated as in the third screen. As in the 4th screen, it is automatically arranged in the timeline to make it as a video.
business.researchBox03Text: It is a technology that automatically colors sketches of webtoons and comics based on AI data. When you color the sketch screen on the left, the result will come out as shown on the right.
business.researchBox04Text: It is a technology that adds dimensionality to the original 2D image. Not only is it possible to look at the image from top to bottom, left, and right, but it also has a diagonal direction effect.
business.translationBox01Text: Depending on the texture, character, and story of the work, the content that works well in each country is different. Through years of professional market research, we go through localization.
business.translationBox02Text: Not only Internet terms, but also onomatopoeia, we work with professional translator in order to provide you works with vivid local languages..
business.translationBox03Text: We work with world wide partner companies (Webtoons, OTT, VOD platforms). We provide local webtoons and webtoon movies to partner companies.
business.platformBox01Text: We do research for Authoring Tool to make webtoons into webtoon movies better. We developed a platform for users to be able to use the Authoring tools and make the webtoon movies by themselves.
business.platformBox02Text: We are developing our own optimized watching platform for readers who waiting for more works to provide webtoons and webtoon movies.
business.newTechTitle:
By using New Technology and New Format,
The Authors' Webtoons/Published Comics
will be able to enter the wider market.
business.newTechText:
IDEACONCERT creates a new content through the Cultural Technology.
In order to make people can enjoy comic books & webtoons more and see the new content that didn't exist before.
"Joyful Imagination" will continue to meet you through various interesting contents.
business.newTechBox01Text: We can attract the attention of adult generation targets who grew up to read published comics. We look forward to communicating with various generations with comic movie content that allows you to enjoy existing comics in a new format.
business.newTechBox02Text: We can serialize our works on new platforms through video contents. We can secure new readers with lively webtoon movies.
business.newTechBox03Text: You can advertise your works globally through overseas distribution. With IDEACONCERT's localization and translation, we are looking forward to more people to know your works worldwide.
business.newTechBox04Text: We create new value for your works through OSMU. We can catch more chances with comic movies and webtoon movies.
business.produceTechTitle: A technology to make images into video content
business.produceTechText:
In order to enjoy webtoons/comics in a new way,
We develop the Authoring Tool that has the feature such as image separation, automatic coloring, automatic translation, etc.
business.produceTechBox01Text: Re-create all the images into video content.
business.produceTechBox03Text: We develop platforms that you can watch various contents.
business.produceTechBox04Text: We will re-publish again the original contents after translate and re-create it into video.
business.movieText:
When we receive webtoon and comics IPs, through the professional video production team,
we can make up to 30 videos content per-week, or 120 video contents per-month.
business.movieDesc: An Authoring Tool to make images into video content
business.costTitle:
Secure Your Contents
without thinking about Initial Production Cost!
business.costText:
IDEACONCERT will cover all the initial production costs.
After the production, profit sharing will be done once we have managed to get profits from sales.
business.creator: Creator
business.calcCost02:
Profit Sharing will be done after deducted production cost from the Sales Amount
(Ratio of Profit Sharing will be discussed separately)

contents.subTitle: The list of contents produced by Ideaconcert.
contents.mainText:
The original story is being produced as a highly immersive webtoon.
Also, find 'Webtoon Movies' created from various webtoons and comic book series.

contact.subTitle: Lets Meet us at IDEACONCERT.
contact.mainText:
Knock on the IDEACONCERT's door.
Searching for a new profit models together with original contents,
or collaborate with the content production research.
We are waiting for your interest.
contact.qnaTitle:
Do you have any questions
about IDEACONCERT?
contact.qnaText:
Write your inquiry.
We will give you an answer to your E-mail.
contact.name: Name
contact.telPlaceHolder: Please enter a contact number without '-'.
contact.privacyCheck: I agree to the privacy policy.
contact.privacyDesc04: 정보통신망 이용촉진 및 정보보호 등에 관한 법률 등에 따라 아래의 개인정보처리방침을 통하여 정보주체인 이용자의 개인정보를 보호하고 홈페이지 이용자가 제공하는 개인정보가 어떤 목적과 방식으로 이용되는지 알려드립니다
contact.privacySub01-1-1: 개인정보란 생존하는 개인에 관한 정보로서 성명
contact.privacySub01-1-2: 주민등록번호 등에 의하여 당해 개인을 알아볼 수 있는 부호
contact.privacySub01-1-6: 영상 및 생체 특성 등에 관한 정보
contact.privacySub01-1-7: 당해 정보만으로는 특정 개인을 알아볼 수 없는 경우에도 다른 정보와 용이하게 결합하여 알아볼 수 있는 것을 포함
contact.privacySub01-2-2: 『정보통신망 이용촉진 및 정보보호 등에 관한 법률』과 개인정보 보호 관련 각종 법규를 준수하고 있습니다
contact.privacySub01-3-1: 회사는 개인정보처리방침을 통하여 고객님의 개인정보가 어떠한 용도와 방식으로 이용되고 있으며
contact.privacySub01-3-2: 개인정보보호를 위해 어떠한 조치가 취해지고 있는지 알려드립니다
contact.privacySub01-4-1: 회사의 개인정보처리방침은 관련 법령 및 내부 운영 방침의 변경에 따라 개정될 수 있습니다
contact.privacySub01-4-2: 개인정보처리방침이 개정되는 경우에는 시행일자 등을 부여하여 개정된 내용을 홈페이지
contact.privacySub01-5-1: 영업의 전부 또는 일부를 양도하거나 합병 등으로 개인정보를 이전하는 경우 서면 전자우편 등을 통하여 고객님께 개별적으로 통지하고
contact.privacySub01-5-2: 회사의 과실 없이 고객님의 연락처를 알 수 없는 경우에 해당하여 서면
contact.privacySub01-5-3: 전자우편 등으로 통지할 수 없는 경우에는 홈페이지
contact.privacySub01-5-4: 첫 화면에서 식별할 수 있도록 표기하여
contact.privacySub01-5-6: 천재지변 등 정당한 사유로 홈페이지 게시가 곤란한 경우에는
contact.privacySub01-5-8: 고객님의 대부분이 특정 지역에 거주하는 경우에는 그 지역을 보급구역으로 하는 일간지로 할 수 있습니다
contact.privacySub02-1-3: 서비스 제공 등을 위하여 필요한 범위에서 최소한의 개인정보만을 수집합니다
contact.privacySub02-2-8: 기타 사회활동 경력 등 고객님의 권리 • 이익이나 사생활을 뚜렷하게 침해할 우려가 있는 개인정보는 수집하지 않습니다
contact.privacySub02-2-10: 고객님께서 수집에 동의하시거나 다른 법률에 따라 특별히 수집 대상 개인정보로 허용된 경우에는 필요한 범위에서 최소한으로 위 개인정보를 수집할 수 있습니다
contact.privacySub02-3-1: 회사는 단말기 접근 권한을 허용 받았어도 허용된 권한 관련 모든 정보가 즉시 수집
contact.privacySub02-3-4: 개인정보 수집 이용 동의를 받은 범위 내에서
contact.privacySub02-3-5: 고객님 단말기 정보에 접근 후에 수집
contact.privacySub02-4-1: 회사는 아래의 경우에 한하여 고객님의 동의 없이 고객님의 개인정보를 수집ㆍ이용할 수 있습니다
contact.privacySub02-4-3: 고객님과의 계약을 이행하기 위하여 필요한 개인정보로서 경제적ㆍ기술적인 사유로 통상적인 동의를 받는 것이 뚜렷하게 곤란한 경우
contact.privacySub02-4-5: 서비스의 제공에 따른 요금정산을 위하여 필요한 경우
contact.privacySub02-4-7: 관련, 법령에 특별한 규정이 있는 경우

careers.subTitle: Be a part of IDEACONCERT.
careers.mainText:
We are waiting for new talented partners.
If you have a clear goal and vision,
Lets join us and Apply for IDEACONCERT.
We will create an environment and foothold for you to always grow together with us.
careers.applyTitle:
Place where we can grow together,
Challenge Now!
careers.applyText:
Please fill out the application form and email us.
After received your application, our staff will
contact you after review your document.
careers.applyBox01Text: When faced with a problem, do not evade and grow looking for a solution.
careers.applyBox02Text: Motivated and internalizes and understands the company's vision and values.
careers.applyBox03Text: Understand that the way to go far is to go together, talk and cooperate.
careers.community01Text: You can choose your working time among 4 different working hours.
careers.community02Text: We call each other as -nim (Mr/Ms) between each staff & executives.
careers.community03Text: We have flexible and soft thinking to deal with problems.
careers.community04Text: You can work self-regulating but with responsibility at the same time.
careers.community05Text: Openly communicate with a respectful attitude.
